attributes.action: Put the onus back onto parents to educate their children from day one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The onus is shifting onto schools to bring up children correctly. However, life and learning start from day one and parents need to educate their own children from birth.  

Schools can only do so much when children arrive, aged 4 or 5 years old, and they have never been read to, let alone held a book. 

Shift the onus back onto parents to begin education at home. 

Some parents-to-be may need help with this, so perhaps 'good parenting' should be taught as a core subject in the final years of school.

rejection.details: Please specify in your petition title what action you would like the government to take. Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
